subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: If federal prosecutors had their way, the man who gave them most of the gruesome details about Michael Vick’s dogfighting enterprise would not go to prison for killing dogs and helping create Bad Newz Kennels.
snippet: If federal prosecutors had their way, the man who gave them most of the gruesome details about Michael Vick’s dogfighting enterprise would not go to prison for killing dogs and helping create Bad Newz Kennels.
